name: Kammok Mantis Hammock Tent
description: Elevate your camping and enjoy a good night's sleep over uneven or slanted ground. The lightweight rainfly and mesh offer bug- and weather-protection and an integrated, structural ridgeline helps you get the right hang angle and elevates the bug net off your body. It all packs in to a small stuff sack to leave you plenty of room in your pack for your other camping essentials.Hammock is made of Gravitas™ 40-denier ripstop nylon that resists stretching.Lightweight Patagium™ 15-denier ripstop nylon rainfly has reinforced guyout points for a variety of set-up options.DWR finish ensures hammock and rainfly dry quickly.Integrated bug mesh is completely removable when camping in bug-free areas.Includes 2 carabiners and 2 polyethylene daisy chains for secure rigging.Integrated roll-top stuff sack is water resistant.Includes hammock, fly, bug net, straps, stakes and guylines.
